mapper.insert: insert into t_order( uid,recv_name, recv_phone,recv_district, recv_address,pay, order_time, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) values( #{uid},#{recvName}, #{recvPhone},#{recvDistrict}, #{recvAddress},#{pay}, #{orderTime }, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )

insert into t_order_item( id,oid,goods_id, goods_image,goods_title, goods_count,goods_price, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) values( #{id},#{oid},#{goodsId}, #{goodsImage},#{goodsTitle}, #{goodsCount},#{goodsPrice}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
